ValTfrm.name: ValTfrm
ValTfrm.description: Represents mappings between fields and attributes. Enrichment rules are part of a decomposition rule, and are used to propagate data to fulfillment order lines.

InputPicklistValueId.description: The identifier of the input list of values.

IsInputBoolean.description: Indicates if a value was entered (true) or not (false).

IsOutputBoolean.description: Indicates if there was an output value (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The name of the related transformation group.

OutputPicklistValueId.description: The identifier of the output list of values.

ValueTransformGroupId.description: The identifier of the related transformation group.
